name: Ledgebase
tagline: Open-source software to better help you succeed at all levels of education.
body:
This is **LedgeBase**, the _open-source_ know**ledge**-**base** for all forms of education, from Home School to Collage; Ledge Base will reinvent the basis of education supplying thousands of unique practice problems and work to study, practice, and distribute for all means of education.

***
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
